Wolfblade::

She kept her sensors at high levels for maximimun effect. Her scanners
started to pick up a signal.  She stopped running and transformed into
bot mode.  Her scanner showed her a signal just above her.  She was
now standing under a tree. Looking around, she could see no ground
tracks. However, she turned her nose up as what she thought were the
remains of a small rodent. Just a long ball of fur wrapped around the
bones.  She turned her optics upward. She thought she saw a bare
movement. Feeling an outright challange was in order, she called up to
it. "Hey, you! Hiding because your scared? Don't worry. We won't kill
without just cause."  She hoped for a fight and wanted one really
badly.  SHe hoped it was a Pred.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice::
>  
> He listened to her quietly, then nodded and followed her in robot
mode, pulling out his disruptor rifle.  His sensor array sweeped the
area, keeping her in sight while he followed.  His crimson optics
looked for anything unusual, listened for what was not normal, keeping
pace with Wolfblade as they stalked their prey.  
>  
> 'Let's see who this is, I don't appreichiate being watched,' he
thought to himself.
>
